Note is selected event

Notes display and interactivity

Recognition of Daughter project types in the Project Design Surface

Tooltip in pins on XmlSource badges with the path of the source file for the data

About box which shows version information
Dashboard now checks for updates and displays this Change Log information about what has been added, updated, changed, bug fixed or deferred.
Ability to send end user’s Dashboard log files, Paratext Log files and the users computer information; including encryption status
Additional modeling of the Notes framework.
Did internal testing on the effects of drive encryption on database usage.  The use of drive encryption only slows down Dashboard by a relatively small percentage.
Pins now includes verse references drawn from Paratext’s Interlinear_*.xml files
Word senses button in word meanings control enabled.
the verse display code in regard to notes, labels and mouse events.
Fix - Fixed shutdown/dispose exception handler
Fix - Fixed never-ending progress wheel when clicking on the verse reference button in Pins.
Fix - Fixed issue where spamming BCV control in Paratext or Dashboard results in constant change of current BCV.
Fix - Fixed issue where sometimes changing chapters via the verse up/down button in the BCV control doesn’t result in the correct BCV.

Alignments can now be added to the EnhancedView.  Pressing shift while hovering over tokens in either source or target will highlight the corresponding aligned token in the other related corpus. Alt hover will clear selection.
On adding in a new Paratext Corpus, you can now search for the corpus name in the dropdown box.

On adding in a new Paratext Corpus, the corpus is automatically scanned for USFM book/chapter/verse issues which may cause problems for the user.  Any errors are reported back and the user can copy them to the clipboard.
On clicking the Pins verse references button the appropriate verse text appears.  Clicking on a verse reference in this dialog changes the current book, chapter, and verse in Dashboard and Paratext.
Pins, Biblical Terms, and the Background Task Status display now have context menus with a copy ability.
Updated the Paratext API plugin to the latest stable version.
Update the way that the EnhancedView’s listview control was handling the currently selected listviewitem which was impacting the notes handling.
Modified the way parallel verses worked by converting directly to VerseDisplayViewModel; code reduction.
Visual updates to Pins (all verse reference buttons now visible, added progress bar on verse reference button press, restyling of verse reference dialog)

Visual and behavior changes to timer.  Coloring is now based on a proportion of the given time, clicking on the timer no longer clears its contents, typing in timer darkens text, and pressing Enter can now be used to start/stop timer.
Fix - Fix for parallel verses not being deleted from the EnhancedView and verse change that was spawning off new VerseDisplays in that window.
Fix - Fix for offset always showing the same parallel verse when offset > 0
Fix - Words dropping out on the Parallel VerseDisplay
Fix - Unhandled threading error on NoteDisplay that caused the note to not update in the VerseDisplay control.
Fix - Biblical terms now loaded even when looking at it
There are upcoming changes to Notes that are not included in this release.
